task.concept:
Personal Information View Your Personal Infromation Personal information includes various details that identify a student
Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name) Contact Details (Email addresses, phone numbers) Addresses Emergency Contacts Text/Email Notification Setup Ethnicity Privacy Restrictions Residency Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests) OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only) Provide Social Security Number Parent and Guardian Access
